Package com.tradingCardInventory.model.Binders

Class SellableBinder

java.lang.Object
com.tradingCardInventory.model.Binders.Binder
com.tradingCardInventory.model.Binders.SellableBinder
Direct Known Subclasses:
LuxuryBinder, PauperBinder, RaresBinder
public abstract class SellableBinder extends Binder
An abstract class representing a binder that can be sold. It maintains a value based on the cards it contains. All classes that extend this must inherit and use the value logic.
